original_title: The American Heritage Collection: The Role of Pastors & Christians in Civil Government
overview: Learn the exciting truths about the efforts of Christians such as Roger Sherman and Charles Thomson and pastors such as Rev. Dr. Samuel Cooper and the Rev. Dr. Johnathan Mayhew. Examine Biblical teachings that caused generations of Christians to believe it was there duty to be involved with government. Discover how the actions of a few dedicated Christians changed the course of a nation.
title: The American Heritage Collection: The Role of Pastors & Christians in Civil Government
